ACTIVE or CANCELLED. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information. | # Flight Plan Trip Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------------------- | :----------: | :-------------------------------------------------------------------| | legId | `'string'`. | Flight leg identifier. | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | carrier | `'string'`. | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | flightTime | `'duration'` | Flight time of the leg, in hours and minutes (hh:mm) format | | regulatedFlightTime | `'duration'` | The flight time value is determined by the captain, in hours and minutes (hh:mm) format| | departureAirport | `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | acRegNo | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | acSubtype | `'string'` | Subtype of aircraft. e.g. 737-800 | | numberOfCockpitCrew | `'string'` | Total number of cockpit crew in the flight | | numberOfCabinCrew | `'string'` | Total number of cabin crew in the flight | | pantryCode | `'string'`. | Identification code assigned to the pantry o
